title: Diary Of The Heart: An Obsessive Infatuation
description: A first love. Will they love me back?An Obsessive Infatuation tells the heartfelt and humble story of teenage love, told from some of W. R. Watkins experiences, how he struggled with the emotional turmoil of a first love. As we are taken deep into his heart, we discover how every heart is actually very similar in what it feels, how those feelings are universal and how they are an important part of being human. But will the risk of revealing this love pay off?An Obsessive Infatuation is the first in the Diary Of The Heart poetry series. If you like modern-day poetry, the unique method of turning poems into one story, and poetry that has neither complicated concepts or huge words, then you will love W. R. Watkinsâ€™ latest poetry collection.Pick up An Obsessive Infatuation to discover the latest powerful original poetry collection today!
author: W.R. Watkins
